subject: Re: [junit] Problems migrating from JUnit3.7 to 3.8.1
msgSnippet: ... I never said something about the constructor, but I could have been clearer.  TestCase.name() has been deprecated and removed in favor of
messageBody:
On Fri, 20 Sep 2002, Robert Wenner <robert@...> wrote:
> On Friday 20 September 2002 08:34, Stefan Bodewig wrote:
>> To run Ant's <junit> task with JUnit 3.8*, you need Ant 1.5 as Ant
>> 1.4.1 and earlier use TestCase#name which has been deprecated in
>> JUnit 3.7 and removed in JUnit 3.8.
>
> TestCase(String) is neither deprecated in nor removed from

I never said something about the constructor, but I could have been
clearer. TestCase.name() has been deprecated and removed in favor of
TestCase.getName() - and I should know as I've fixed Ant myself ;-)

Stefan
